name: Yumemizuki Mizuki
desc:
"Embrace of Enchanting Dreams" Yumemizuki Mizuki

Clouds of doubt depart, moonlight amidst dreams unveiled, to grace dreamers' hearts.

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
<color=#ffffffa6>Deals 2</color> <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> <color=#ffffffa6>. Attaches</color> <color=#ffffff>Dreamdrifter</color> <color=#ffffffa6>to self.</color>
<color=#ece5d8>Dreamdrifter</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>When you declare the end of your Round:</color> <color=#ffffffa6>Replace the active character with the character to which this is attached, and deal 1</color> <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> <color=#ffffffa6>.</color>
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 1</color>

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
<color=#ffffffa6>Deals 3</color> <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> <color=#ffffffa6>, creates 1</color> <color=#ffffff>Yumemi Style Special Snacks</color> <color=#ffffffa6>and places it on top of your deck, and summons</color> <color=#ffffff>Mini Baku</color> <color=#ffffffa6>.</color>

<color=#ffd780>Event Card</color>
<color=#ffffff>When this card enters your Hand:</color> <color=#ffffffa6>If your active character's HP is above 5, deal 1</color> <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> <color=#ffffffa6>. Otherwise, heal them for 2 HP. After use, discard this card and draw 1 card.</color>

<color=#ffd780>Summon</color>
<color=#ffffff>End Phase:</color> <color=#ffffffa6>Create 1</color> <color=#ffffff>Yumemi Style Special Snacks</color> <color=#ffffffa6>and place it at the top of your deck.</color>
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 3</color>

Reacts with Elements if they are already applied:
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Cryo Swirl</color> : Deals 1 Cryo DMG to all opposing chracters except the target
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Hydro Swirl:</color> Deals 1 Hydro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Pyro Swirl</color> : Deals 1 Pyro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Electro Swirl</color> : Deals 1 Electro DMG to all opposing characters except the target

<color=#ece5d8>Usage(s)</color>
After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#ffffff>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.
This card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#ffffff>Usages</color> remaining.

value.name: Your Echo I Meet in Dreams
value.desc:
Yumemizuki Mizuki: Your Echo I Meet in Dreams

"Cast your worries to the wind."

value.text: Reward for inviting Yumemizuki Mizuki to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

value.name: Yumemizuki Mizuki
value.desc: A shareholder of Aisa Bathhouse, a baku, and a clinical psychologist. Dedicated to the dispersal of nightmares, and to bringing people peace of mind.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Dynamic Skin can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text:
.
Lustrous Skin can only be purchased after obtaining Dynamic Skin.

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Okay, let's try a little friendly sparring, it'll help us relax."
<color=#ece5d8>Hint: Yumemizuki Mizuki's deck is built around Swirl and Multi-Elemental DMG. Its strength lies in flexible switching and dealing Swirl DMG.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.desc:

Clouds of doubt depart, moonlight amidst dreams unveiled, to grace dreamers' hearts.

customize.name: Yae Miko
customize.desc:
"Astute Amusement" Yae Miko

The wise and beautiful Yae Miko.

customize.name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
customize.desc:
"Pearl of Wisdom" Sangonomiya Kokomi

To survive hardship, you must prepare for hardship.

customize.name: Match Invitation Letter
customize.desc: You can select a player from the Player List via the invitation board, and then entrust The Cat's Tail to send out an invitation using this Invitation Letter. The invited player will head over to the tavern and wait for a duel with you.

customize.name: Yumemizuki Mizuki
customize.desc:

customize.desc:

"Cast your worries to the wind."

customize.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Achieve victory with characters defeated less than twice during the battle</color>

customize.name: Your Echo I Meet in Dreams
customize.desc:
Yumemizuki Mizuki: Your Echo I Meet in Dreams

"Cast your worries to the wind."

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"It's said that appropriate levels of mental stimulation can help lift the spirits. I wonder if this game can be turned into a brand-new form of therapy..."
<color=#ece5d8>Special Rule: "Yumemizuki Mizuki" starts with the Talent Card "Your Echo I Meet in Dreams" equipped.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

Reach Player Level 7
Complete 3 challenge objective(s) in Yumemizuki Mizuki: Friendly

customize.name: Player EXP
customize.desc: Obtained by winning Genius Invokation TCG matches. Every duel you won builds upon the paths to victory, such is the act of earning experience itself. To know how to overcome and subdue the adversary in any situation is the greatest strength that a player can possess.
